title: Letterhead, "United Fruit Company, New York", ca. 1947
medium: Letterpress: yellow, red, black ink on heavy yellow wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted in raised yellow, upper center:  United Fruit Company.
Imprinted down right side of sheet at upper right printed in yellow: PIER 3, NORTH RIVER, NEW YORK 6, N.Y.
description: Company name (in raised yellow ink) across top of sheet with logo at upper left.  Logo of United Fruit Company: a banana dressed as a female Spanish dancer wearing in a red skirt with black stripes and a hat with fruit.  In yellow border surrounding logo: Chiquita Banana (imprinted at top); c.1947 United Fruit Company [registered trademark], imprinted below.  Company address is imprinted vertically at upper right.

tombstone.epitaph: Letterhead, "United Fruit Company, New York", ca. 1947. Letterpress: yellow, red, black ink on heavy yellow wove paper. Gift of Thomas F. O'Malley. 1998-64-1.
